update.description: Tutorial for FlashLightPlugin and LedPlugin, which will be included in the next release of gazebo9 \(as of Jul 24, 2018\)
update.title: Flashlight plugin

content.raw: Add a new line before the code block.
content.html: Add a new line before the code block.

content.raw:
The images are not displayed. Use:

‌

    [[file:files/<YOUR_IMAGE>.png|640px]]

And move the images to the `files` subdirectory.
content.html:
The images are not displayed. Use:

‌

[[file:files/<YOUR_IMAGE>.png|640px]]

And move the images to the files subdirectory.

content.raw:
patter**n**s

The example block probably requires a new line after `For example,`.
content.html:
patterns

The example block probably requires a new line after For example,.

content.raw: Could you specify the format of the color? from 0-1? from 0 to 255?
content.html: Could you specify the format of the color? from 0-1? from 0 to 255?

content.raw: It specifies for how long the light should be dimmed in seconds?
content.html: It specifies for how long the light should be dimmed in seconds?

content.raw: It specifies for how long the light should be on in seconds.?
content.html: It specifies for how long the light should be on in seconds.?

content.raw: I think you need to escape the `_` with `\_`.
content.html: I think you need to escape the _ with \_.

content.raw: You can use this element as many times as the number of lights contained in your model?
content.html: You can use this element as many times as the number of lights contained in your model?

content.raw:
I created a branch to previsualize them:

* [http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?branch=flashlight\_plugin&tut=flashlight\_plugin](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?branch=flashlight_plugin&tut=flashlight_plugin)
* [http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?branch=flashlight\_plugin&tut=led\_plugin](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?branch=flashlight_plugin&tut=led_plugin)
